Items.Content:
This oceanfront Emerabld Beach vacation property offers 2 bedroom/2 bath unit and is located in the popular Ocean Drive area.
 Amenities include: Sundecks and Grill facilities. Coin operated laundry facilities in each building. This traditional 2 bedroom, 2 bath unit has a fully equipped kitched with microwave, 2 cable TVs, DVD, telephone, heat and air conditioning. Unit has side ocean view. Two car parking. 
 
 NO PETS, MOTORCYCLES, BOATS, TRAILERS or RV's ALLOWED. Accommodates: 6, non-smoking, FREE WIRELESS INTERNET 
 
 $499 a week for summer months.

Items.Content:
Conveniently located to all types of family entertainment, this beach condo mid-rise, oceanfront property offers spacious 3 bedroom, 2 bath unit, elevator, a large oceanfront outdoor pool with a wonderful view of the ocean! 
 Amenities - This designer decorated unit offers an oceanfront balcony off of the living room, fully equipped kitchen with microwave, 2 flat screen cable TV’s. Two car parking allowed; one on-site/one overflow parking. 
 
 NO PETS, MOTORCYCLES, BOATS, RV’S or TRAILERS ALLOWED. FREE WIRELESS INTERNET ACCESS AVAILABLE 
 
 $699 to $899 a week for summer month.

Items.Content:
These well-maintained, spacious luxury 3 bedroom and 3 bath designer units offer a gorgeous view from your large oceanfront balcony off the living room and master bedroom. The property amenities include: NICE OCEANFRONT POOL (heated April and Oct), sundeck, outside showers, outdoor grill area, elevators, and lobby key entrance.  The units offer fully equipped kitchen with microwave, several cable TV’s, washer/dryer, and separate shower in master bath. 
 
 NO PETS, BOATS, TRAILERS or RV’S ALLOWED. WIRELESS INTERNET ACCESS AVAILABLE 
 
 $799 to $1099 a week for summer months.
